description:
Dreambaby Flexible Rapid Response Clinical Thermometer:
The Dreambaby¬¨√Ü Rapid Response Clinical Thermometer is a must for your getting-ready-for-baby checklist. Be prepared for any emergency or simply put your mind at ease with an accurate reading in just 10 seconds!

The Dreambaby¬¨√Ü Rapid Response Clinical Thermometer is equipped with a state of the art fever alert indicator. It gives a quick and accurate reading in 10 seconds and a rapid beep will sound if a fever ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ temperature above 37.8¬¨‚àûc ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ is detected.

  • Fever Alert ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ a rapid beep will sound if fever is detected
  • Quick and accurate temperature reading in 10 seconds (measured orally)
  • Auto switch off
  • Memory function
  • Flexible tip for easier use and greater comfort for baby
  • Large easy to read digital display
  • Choose either Celsius or Fahrenheit options
  • Case for hygienic storage
  • Contains no mercury

Approx Length of Item: 14cm

Includes:
1 x Dreambaby Flexible Rapid Response Clinical Thermometer

WARNING: Keep button batteries out of children‚Äö√Ñ√¥s reach:
Keep coin-sized button batteries and devices out of sight and out of reach.
Examine devices and make sure the battery compartment is secure.
Dispose of used button batteries immediately. Flat batteries can still be dangerous.
If you suspect a child has swallowed a button battery, immediately go to a hospital emergency room. Do not let the child eat or drink and do not induce vomiting.
Call the Poisons Information Centre on Australia 13 11 26 or New Zealand 0800 764 766 for additional treatment information.
Tell others about the risk associated with button batteries and how to keep their children safe.
